Setting up fuse¶

To install fuse you need to make sure to have the latest version of nestpy installed. You can install nestpy from the source code by running the following commands:

$ git clone https://github.com/NESTCollaboration/nestpy
$ cd nestpy
$ git submodule update --init --recursive
$ pip install .

Then its time to install fuse. All other dependencies will be installed automatically.

$ git clone https://github.com/XENONnT/fuse.git
$ cd fuse
$ pip install .
